moves.name: Wrap
moves.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Glare
moves.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Acid
moves.description: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets' Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

moves.name: Swallow
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

moves.name: Spit Up
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

moves.name: Belch
moves.description: The user lets out a damaging belch on the target. The user must eat a Berry to use this move.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Coil
moves.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

moves.name: Gunk Shot
moves.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. It may also poison the target.
